descriptions.en: COMBUSKEN toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This POKéMON’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out ten kicks in one second.
descriptions.es: Su habilidad le permite dar diez patadas por segundo. Lanza potentes gritos para intimidar.
descriptions.ca: El COMBUSKEN endureix les seves cames i cuixes corrent per camps i muntanyes. Les cames d'aquest POKÉMON tenen tant velocitat com força, i li permeten donar deu puntades de peu en un segon.
